attributes.action: Maintain the Sovereignty, Freedom and Human rights of Britain and  Commonwealth
attributes.additional_details:
Those wishing to use (CBDC) and a biometric digital identity can.
Those wishing not to, must be free to refuse without discretion, penalty or mandate.
No law or mandate be passed, which could be detrimental to the people or the British Constitution to force the use of a 3rd party ID system & payment system.
attributes.background:
Ensure that every citizen is given a “Free Choice regarding
the 3rd party system offering  “Digital Identity and payment”,
Preserve traditional methods of identity checks and payments.
Ensure essential services and businesses are given freedom to use Digital and Traditional methods.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Guarantee access to public services without need for a digital ID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633673

Make a UK law requiring all establishments to accept cash: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636557
